Description: Papyrus bearing 10 lines of a Coptic text written against the fibres (verso) and 1 line along the fibres (recto).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380700) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380700)
